[set page_title][L]Launch[/L][/set] [set ui_checklist]1[/set] [set help_name]wizard.launch[/set] @_UI_STD_HEAD_@

[L]To launch your site, click launch. The following will occur[/L]:

  • [L]All orders will be deleted from the order database (if selected).[/L]
  • [L]All customer records will be deleted from the user database (if selected).[/L]
  • [L]The order number will be reset.[/L]
  • [L]The secure web server will be enabled. (If you don't accept credit cards, this is optional.)[/L]

[table-editor left_width=120 table_width=500 wizard=1 defaults=1 bottom_buttons=1 next_text=Launch no_top=1 no_bottom=1 row_template="[scratch row_template]" ui_profile="*launch" mv_nextpage="[either][cgi ui_nextpage][or]__UI_BASE__/wizard/do_launch[/either]" mv_prevpage="[either][cgi ui_prevpage][or]__UI_BASE__/wizard/step_preview[/either]" hidden.ui_return_to="__UI_BASE__/index" ui_wizard_fields="nukeorders nukeusers orderstart enablesecure" label.nukeorders="[L]Delete sample order data[/L]" help.nukeorders="[L]Select Yes if you wish to start with an empty order database[/L]" widget.nukeorders=yesno default.nukeorders=1 label.nukeusers="[L]Delete sample user data[/L]" help.nukeusers="[L]Select Yes if you wish to start with an empty customer database[/L]" widget.nukeusers=yesno default.nukeusers=1 label.orderstart="[L]Starting order number[/L]" help.orderstart="[L]First order number -- only letters/digits[/L]" widget.orderstart=text_8 filter.orderstart=alphanumeric default.orderstart=01000 label.enablesecure="[L]Enable Secure (SSL)[/L]" help.enablesecure="[L]Select Yes if your Stronghold secure server is set up[/L]" override.enablesecure=1 widget.enablesecure=select passed.enablesecure="0=[L]No[/L], 1=[L]Yes[/L]" ] @_UI_STD_FOOTER_@
